verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Bildad <S%H1085><s%> the Shuhite, <S%H7747><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Dominion <S%H4910><s%> and fear <S%H6343><s%> are with him, he makes <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in his high <S%H4791><s%> places.
Is there any number <S%H4557><s%> of his armies? <S%H1416><s%> and on whom <S%H4310><s%> does not his light <S%H216><s%> arise? <S%H6965><s%>
How <S%H4100><s%> then can man <S%H582><s%> be justified <S%H6663><s%> with God? <S%H410><s%> or how <S%H637><s%> can he be clean <S%H2135><s%> that is born <S%H3205><s%> of a woman? <S%H802><s%>
Behold <S%H2005><s%> even to the moon, <S%H3394><s%> and it shines <S%H166><s%> not; yes, the stars <S%H3556><s%> are not pure <S%H2141><s%> in his sight. <S%H5869><s%>
How <S%H4100><s%> much <S%H637><s%> less man, <S%H582><s%> that is a worm? <S%H7415><s%> and the son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> which is a worm? <S%H8438><s%>
